com.bragi.sonify.music

Class RiffPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bragi.sonify.music.RiffPlayer
  • Deprecated.

    public class RiffPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is intended to provide simple test capabilities for previously created riffs. Since a riff only specifies pitch and no note value, it is randomly chosen. In this version, all riffs which are declared in the Riff class are played subsequently. Enjoy this awesome piece of high culture. Acts as my digital playground. (JCK)
    Author:
    Jan-Christoph Klie
